oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carte de Vistie of an unidentified US officer in the 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt, USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This CdV is either of a major or a lieutenant-colonel in the 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA. The image was part of a larger collection of members of the 13th. The regiment was raised in upper East Tennessee. The regiment was part of the brigade commanded by Tennessean Alvan Cullem Gillem. Gillem's brigade served in East Tennessee throughout 1864 and into North Carolina and Virginia in 1865.
